LanguageData.MakeChemfuelFromCorpse.label: refine chemfuel from corpse
LanguageData.MakeChemfuelFromCorpse.description: Witness the last heat and light of a life.
LanguageData.MakeFertilizerFromCorpse.label: make fertilizer from corpse
LanguageData.MakeFertilizerFromCorpse.description: Grind the meat and put them in fermentation process.Now we get the bloody fertilizer which is full of nutrient.
LanguageData.BreedMaggotsWithCorpse.label: breed the maggots
LanguageData.BreedMaggotsWithCorpse.description: The maggots in rimworld can grow and reproduce in unbelievable efficiency if they get enough corpses.They don't care about fresh or rotten, just don't give them the antiseptic one.
LanguageData.MakeProteinPowderFromCorpse.label: product proteinPowder with corpse
LanguageData.MakeProteinPowderFromCorpse.description: Don't worry,nobody will find out what he is actually eating.
LanguageData.MakeProteinPowderFromMaggots.label: make ProteinPowder from maggots
LanguageData.MakeProteinPowderFromMaggots.description: Don't worry,nobody will find out what he is actually eating.
LanguageData.TakeBloodFromCorpse.label: draw blood from corpse
LanguageData.TakeBloodFromCorpse.description: Blood is unnecessary for a dead body, but essential for the living one.
LanguageData.MakeAntisepticCorpse.label: make antiseptic corpse
LanguageData.MakeAntisepticCorpse.description: To make an corpse filled with herbs and wrapped by cloth.Sounds like mummy,but it's better.Whenever you remove the cloth,you will still get a body without decay and dehydration.
